titles: An exortacion to charite very needefull at this tyme for eche man and woman to inbrace, compyled by Wyllyam Conway.
author: Conway, William, fl. 1550.
publisher: In fletestrete at the sygne of the George, nexte to saynt Dunstones church by Wyllyam Powel. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: An exortacion to charitie.
A3r mentions the past '.xv. C. and .1. yeres'.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
